name: Python with Anaconda & JupyterLab
postCreateCommand: conda create -n ml-zoomcamp -y python=3.11 && conda run -n ml-zoomcamp conda install -y jupyterlab ipykernel scikit-learn pandas numpy seaborn && conda run -n ml-zoomcamp python -m ipykernel install --user --name=ml-zoomcamp --display-name 'Python (ml-zoomcamp)' && echo 'if [ -f /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh ]; then . /opt/conda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh; conda activate ml-zoomcamp; fi' >> ~/.bashrc
